product_id.description: Unique identifier for the specific product mentioned in the feedback.
product_id.title: Product Id

condition.description: Customer feedback regarding the physical state of the product.
condition.title: Condition

functionality.description: Feedback regarding how well the product functions as expected.
functionality.title: Functionality

durability.description: Comments about the longevity and durability of the product.
durability.title: Durability

met_expectations.description: Indicator of whether the product met the customer's expectations.
met_expectations.title: Met Expectations

quality_issues.description: Array of specific quality issues reported by the customer.
quality_issues.title: Quality Issues

shipping_speed.description: Feedback regarding the speed of delivery.
shipping_speed.title: Shipping Speed

packaging_quality.description: Comments on the quality of the packaging during delivery.
packaging_quality.title: Packaging Quality

delivery_accuracy.description: Indicates whether the correct items were delivered.
delivery_accuracy.title: Delivery Accuracy

logistics_issues.description: Array of issues encountered during delivery.
logistics_issues.title: Logistics Issues

met_promised_timeline.description: Indicates if the delivery met the promised timeline.
met_promised_timeline.title: Met Promised Timeline

overall_satisfaction.description: Overall satisfaction rating provided by the customer, typically on a scale from 1 to 10.
overall_satisfaction.title: Overall Satisfaction

nps_score.description: Net Promoter Score to determine likelihood to recommend, typically on a scale from 0 to 10.
nps_score.title: Nps Score

repurchase_likelihood.description: Likelihood that the customer would repurchase, typically on a scale from 1 to 5.
repurchase_likelihood.title: Repurchase Likelihood

emotional_sentiment.description: The emotional sentiment expressed in feedback, typically positive, neutral, or negative.
emotional_sentiment.title: Emotional Sentiment

responsiveness.description: Feedback on how quickly customer service responded.
responsiveness.title: Responsiveness

problem_resolution.description: Effectiveness of customer service in resolving issues.
problem_resolution.title: Problem Resolution

staff_professionalism.description: Comments on the professionalism of the customer service staff.
staff_professionalism.title: Staff Professionalism

competitor_mentions.description: List of competitors mentioned by customers.
competitor_mentions.title: Competitor Mentions

price_comparisons.description: Feedback regarding price comparisons with competitors.
price_comparisons.title: Price Comparisons

alternative_products.description: List of alternative products considered by the customer.
alternative_products.title: Alternative Products

product_quality_assessment.description: Feedback details about the product quality including condition, functionality, durability, and whether it met customer expectations.

delivery_experience.description: Information about the customer's delivery experience.

customer_satisfaction_metrics.description: Metrics related to overall customer satisfaction.

competitive_insights.description: Insights related to competitors and market comparisons.

actionable_recommendations.description: Array of actionable recommendations based on the feedback.
actionable_recommendations.title: Actionable Recommendations

feedback_date.description: The date and time when the feedback was submitted.
feedback_date.title: Feedback Date

product_category.description: The category to which the product belongs.
product_category.title: Product Category

customer_segment.description: The segment or profile of the customer providing feedback.
customer_segment.title: Customer Segment

issue_severity.description: The perceived severity of the issues raised in the feedback.
issue_severity.title: Issue Severity
